messages.subject: Oregon Live 11-09-00 Holocaust survivor will tell her stories
messages.msgSnippet: Let me call your attention to the following article in today s Oregonian: http://www.oregonlive.com/news/oregonian/metrosouthwest.ssf?/news/oregonian/
messages.messageBody:
Let me call your attention to the following article in today's Oregonian:


http://www.oregonlive.com/news/oregonian/metrosouthwest.ssf?/news/oregonian/
00/11/metrosouthwest/sw_tkrist09.frame


To access it, you have at least 3 options:

1. Click on the link. It will take you to "The Oregonian Metro Southwest
Extra." From there, just click on "Today's Metro Southwest Headlines," and
when you get there, scroll down 'til you find "Holocaust Survivor Will Tell
Her Stories."

2. Click on the link. Then copy and paste on the end of the URL (in your
browser's URL field), the remainder of the link on this message (the part
which wasn't underlined).

3. Click on the attachment and let it take you there directly.


Happy reading,

John Andersen
Unconventional Ideas at http://www.unconventionalideas.com
